page.title: 12Games We Play at School
page.content: The most popular games are played in the summer.Elastics is a game played with elastic and three people.Two people stand in a ring of elastic, while the other one jumps in and out of the elastic.This used to be called French Skipping.We also play a game called British Bulldog at the bottom of the field. Two people are on; they pick a person to run across. The person has to get across without being pushed down. If he makes it all the other people can run across.We also play playground tag. Two people are 'on' and the rest have to try to get to the bench but the two that are 'on' guard the bench. We also play rounders, cricket and sometimes tennis too.In the winter we slide along the flat snow,but there aren't so many popular winter games. We often just stand around talking.
